name: Miriam's Mana Belly (CM)
description:
Warning: Contains belly expansion fetish content.

Hello! Here's a project commissioned by barosans, featuring art by TheFluffyFuffer, of Miriam from Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night in a swimsuit. In this mini-game she stores mana in her belly, collected from mana roses that fall from the top of the screen, but the mana can become unstable and release shockwaves if her belly isn't rubbed occasionally.

Controls:
R to restart
Left mouse to drag mana roses, to fuse them with each other or bring them to Miriam's belly to absorb them
Right mouse to rub Miriam's belly and prevent mana shockwaves from pushing away mana roses

The game ends when Miriam's belly reaches maximal size and mana roses stop falling.

V1.1: I fixed an issue with the mana roses sometimes not appearing after restarting.
